We can only proceed with calculating the additional amount if we know the original amount paid.

<function-thoughts>The transaction for the iPhone purchase appears to be the one with an amount of 1000.0 and subject 'Purchase at Apple Store: iPhone 3GS'. Now, we need to calculate the additional VAT (19.5% of the amount) and add a fee of 5.29.</function-thoughts>
